department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Partial repair or complete replacement of the above noted loading docks
full_summary:
# Loading Docks Assessment and Repair, Prince Albert, Saskatchewan

### Tender Information

- **Reference Number**: WS3765771658
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3765771658
- **Publication Date**: December 15, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: January 31, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
- **Amendment Number**: 2
- **Amendment Date**: January 12, 2023

### Project Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada invites qualified architectural firms with a multi-disciplinary team of sub-consultants to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the assessment of three existing loading docks at the Saskatchewan Penitentiary. The project entails prioritizing repairs based on the condition of the docks and either repairing or replacing them as needed.

Location: Prince Albert, Saskatchewan

### Eligibility

Only proponents who complete and sign the required legal documents as well as fulfill other eligibility requirements contained in the RFP package may participate in this solicitation.

### Proposal Evaluation

Solicitation will be evaluated based on the combined rating of technical merit and price. The highest rated proposal will be selected for award.

### Additional Information

- **Procurement Category**: SRV
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Contact Information

For more information, please visit the online posting http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14909263 and contact:

- **Hector Ho**
- **[Hector.Ho@tspgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Hector.Ho@tspgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)**
- **Public Works and Government Services Canada**
- **11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage**
- **Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5**
- **(Phone) N/A**
- **(Fax) N/A**
